name: banzo
description:
Banzo is a cartoonish style puzzle game which contain a cute little "thing" named banzo.

You need to push the rocks to make the rooms symmetric.

Also, Banzo don't like to move so much, you have limited movements every level.

If you stuck on a level: 

  1. You can skip the level.
  2. You can change the difficulty to "Baby Mode" („ಡωಡ„).
  3. You can see the level database.
Note: !! Don't use "Fullscreen Button", press "F1 Key" instead !!

CREDITS:

ARTS: ME

MUSICS: TAD

Made with Godot for Godot Wild Jam 47

Theme : Symmetry

Wildcard(s) : None
